title: Santo Antonio (Picos de)
body:
In the parish of Santo António, there is a peak with an altitude of 400 meters, located a short distance from the parish church.

Overlooking the parish of Curral das Freiras, there is a mountainous elevation reaching an altitude of 1740 meters, from whose heights vast panoramas can be seen.

Santo António: Parish where the peak with an altitude of 400 meters is located.
